activities.loc: JMB Check Monitor & Posted Calendar for Courtroom

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Tommy L Robinson

defendant.name: Robinson, Tommy L
defendant.address: 12 Ann St; Apt 2, Rice Lake, WI 54868

records.addlTxt: Michelle Erdman has been appointed to represent the defendant.
Body Only - Wisconsin and Adjacent States

2:02 PM Defendant Tommy L Robinson not in court.  Attorney Michelle M Erdman not in court.  Attorney Brian H. Wright in court for State of Wisconsin. 
COVERS 22CF72, 22CF197 & 22CF198.
State requests warrant.  Court orders Bench Warrant Body Only Wisconsin and Adjacent States on all files. 

***2:42 p.m. Case recalled.  Attorney Michelle Erdman appears in person with Defendant Tommy L. Robinson.  No one appears for the State and Court relates it's not needed.  Attorney Erdman relates she is only appointed in 22CF72, but willing to take the other 2 files and there is a global resolution.  Court quashes warrants ordered earlier and resets all files for Plea on 12/07/22 at 10:00 a.m.  before Judge Bitney.

Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-908-8473.

1:23 PM Defendant Tommy L Robinson appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Michelle M Erdman appeared by video for Tommy L Robinson.  Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin. 

COVERS 22CF197 & 22CF198 

Court relates.  Attorney Erdman will represent Defendant in both cases. 

22CF197- Bond set.  AIA 10/19/22 at 2:00pm. 

22CF198 - $2500.00 Signature bond set. No special conditions.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 19, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
